title: Wired Mag face
content:
Anyone know this san-serif slab face?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/face_5658.jpg)

 [‹ Nordstrom Font ID please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103815/http:/typophile.com/node/50709 "Go to previous forum topic") [Erwin sales logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103815/http:/typophile.com/node/50702 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jcon

comments.content: yeah, kind of a misnomer, but couldn’t think of how to describe it... what’s the name of the face though? i’ve scoured fontshop and haven’t found it yet

I would call this a modular, [chamfered](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103815/http:/typophile.com/wiki/chamfered), square sans serif. Don’t know what font it is, but you might like [Skipper](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103815/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/75313).
Thx. Skipper is nice, but a bit wider than this sample. Any other ideas about what this face might be?
